summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganGive BackL'Oreal's Infallible 3-Second Setting Mist Spray gives up to 36H wear in just one spray. The professional-inspired aerosol format instantly dries. This setting spray offers transfer and sweat-resistant wear, and feels lightweight.
details: DetailsBenefitsUp to 36HR transfer, sweat & smudge-resistant wear in just one sprayProfessional-inspired microfine aerosol mist format instantly dries & applies evenly without leaving droplets or tracesLightweight & breathable on skinFace, eye & lip makeup resists transfer all dayProvides a natural finishDoes not leave a white cast, settle into imperfections, mark, or cakePrevents makeup from cracking & flakingItem 2630338How To UseShake well before use. Hold spray 12 inches away from face and spray in a circular motion for even distribution. Keep eyes and mouth closed. Wipe excess product.Do not intentionally inhale. In case of irritation, rinse immediately with water.IngredientsAlcohol Denat., Dimethyl Ether, Aqua/Water/Eau, VA/Crotonates/Vinyl Neodecanoate Copolymer, Aminomethyl Propanol, Triethyl Citrate, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Benzyl Alcohol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Octylacrylamide/Acrylates/Butylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Parfum/Fragrance (F.I.L. N70026312/1).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Shake well before use. Hold spray 12 inches away from face and spray in a circular motion for even distribution. Keep eyes and mouth closed. Wipe excess product.Do not intentionally inhale. In case of irritation, rinse immediately with water.

reviews.headline: My go to
reviews.comments: I have tried others and nothing works as well

reviews.headline: Perfect For Long-Wear
reviews.comments: I feel like this is a great dupe for the One Size setting spray - this lays down my makeup and it will not budge for hours. Does feel like hairspray when initially putting on but besides that, it's perfect!

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy this again!
reviews.comments: This made my makeup last all night long. I even hugged people and no transfer. You have to spray between different products and let it fully dry to get the maximum use.

reviews.headline: It's the bomb !
reviews.comments: I love this ! My makeup did not run or anything !!!

reviews.headline: Matte finish
reviews.comments: It gives you a matte finish but my makeup still came off

reviews.headline: Always a repurchase
reviews.comments: Keeps my makeup on all day, transfer proof, waterproof, cry proof, breakup proof etc. I LOVE this stuff.

reviews.headline: I don't get the hype....
reviews.comments: I was hearing rave reviews on this spray so I tried it out for myself- turns out my face felt and looked even more oily than usual! I don't understand why people like this. Will be returning immediately.

reviews.headline: No budge transfer proof
reviews.comments: After several hours of reading reviews on several different platforms, I decided to give this setting spray a try. I normally use the Milani mat charcoal spray I like it. It works for me, but I always like to try different options. My other go to is the professional setting spray that one is quite expensive, but it does keep my makeup mat and lasting all day. This L'Oreal setting spray is a holy Grail. It's a continuous fine mist which I like as the other two you have to keep spraying, and sometimes the spray distribution is uneven many people State that the L'Oreal setting spray has an odor or a sticky feeling compared to hairspray. I personally did not find that to be true. It was a slow continuous mist with even distribution and my makeup lasted all day no transfer no budge normally when I wear my eyeglasses or put my phone up to my face, I will always have a make up residue on the nose pieces of my sunglasses or eyeglasses or I will have make up residue left on my phone. I did not have this with the L'Oreal setting spray so this will definitely be my go to brand from now on once I finish my other ones

reviews.headline: Absolutely amazing!
reviews.comments: It works perfectly to keep my makeup in place. Even after 12 hours of work, it looks like I just applied it. I'll definitely keep repurchasing it.

reviews.headline: Does the job
reviews.comments: This does the job for setting, not 100% transfer proof. I still really like the product and good price point.

reviews.headline: Gross
reviews.comments: I bought this as I've seen several influencers saying this is a dupe and saw it in the checkout line, so I figured I'd give it a shot. This allegedly is the dupe for One Size by Patrick Starrr and literally feel bamboozled. This product made my face feel sticky, smells awful, and is very wet feeling for an aerosol application. The smell was so bad I had to spray Chanel on my face. Went to Ulta the next day to return this. Won't buy again nor recommend to anyone.

reviews.headline: Best setting spray!
reviews.comments: I have tried many and this is the best! Fine mist is key and my makeup stays put in this hot humid weather. Dries in seconds and face does not feel stiff. I have already reordered. It is a must have in my routine. They need to make a super size bottle!!

reviews.headline: Definitely top number 1 setting spray!
reviews.comments: BEST setting spray, it lasts my entire work day even through humidity, it leaves a true mattifying finish without being sticky. typically don't leave reviews but i just had to leave one for this.

reviews.headline: GET IT!!
reviews.comments:
I am a super oily gal in the hot desert heat. I have tried NUMEROUS settings sprays, from the highest ends, to drugstore. This by far will be one that I buy on repeat. Once its sprayed, I know my makeup is locked in. Paired with the infallible matte foundation, I have finally found my holy grail. 
Yes, the scent is very hairspray-esque, but the smell only last momentarily. 

On another note, I do have acne prone, and sensitive skin. This has not effected any if my sensitivity.

reviews.headline: Not worth your money
reviews.comments: I was really looking for a one size dupe, and I tried out this setting spray. It made my makeup pill and peel off my face. that's never happened to me before, do not recommend at all!

reviews.headline: Does what it says
reviews.comments: It does what it says, but I am fully convinced its just hairspray‚Ä¶

reviews.headline: Pleasantly surprised!
reviews.comments: This setting spray has exceeded my expectations. It's made my makeup last so much longer throughout the day. I give it 4 stars because of the size of the bottle, but I will absolutely repurchase!

reviews.headline: I absolutely love this setting spray!
reviews.comments: MUA approved. It reallt does makeup last all night! I love the sprayer on it as well!! Ive purchased SEVERAL bottles!

reviews.headline: Setting Spray
reviews.comments: Not my favorite setting spray. It leaves a cakey finish and makes my makeup patchy. Would not recommend.

faceoff_positive.comments: I do like this setting spray it says up to 36 hours non-transferable makeup. Which I'm not sure of. The spray is very nice it's very soft and not at all harsh or really wet.. me personally I like a setting spray it's going to help melt my makeup together so when it's either really dewy or a little wet and this one is neither so I'm not sure if I would be the targeted consumer for this but I do enjoy it the Finish is just a natural finish after it dries.
faceoff_positive.headline: Beautiful spray!! Very light and delicate

faceoff_negative.comments: I worked in food service and this product made my makeup stay all day long through sweat, steam, getting splashed in the face with various liquids ... you name it, my makeup didn't budge. Which is awesome! I would spray this on top of my creams before powdering, to help my base stay in place since that matters more to me so that the coverage my foundation and concealer provides stayed put. If I knew I was working a rough shift, I would also use this on top of my finished makeup. But as so many others have mentioned, it's essentially hairspray for your face. It smells like hairspray, sprays like hair spray, sticks like hairspray. This isn't something I would use on a daily basis because the hold it provides isn't necessary for daily use for me, but would definitely use for special events, wedding, prom, etc. I wore it during food service work to test its durability against sweating, steam, liquids, etc, which it definitely lived up to the hype. Outside of that, it's fairly heavy for daily use in my opinion. Overall great product and I would definitely recommend if you're looking for something that has a super strong hold and will stand up to just about anything, but if you're doing daily use  you'll need to buy quite a bit because it is a small bottle.
faceoff_negative.headline: Great product but it's basically hairspray
